text: Holiday Inn Express is an American-based mid-priced hotel chain. It is within the IHG Hotels & Resorts family of brands. It was originally founded in 1990 as an "express" hotel. Their focus is on offering limited services at a reasonable price. Standard amenities lean toward the convenient and practical which cater to business travelers and short-term stays. It has 2,826 locations with 292,000 rooms. Category:American hotel chains Category:1990 establishments in the United States
title: Holiday Inn Express
